body: Guys I Just Want to do a quick discussion please staff don't lock this or anything because I really want a cape I keep looking on youtube and it keeps telling me to go to www.mccapes.net and it comes up with a different screen from the video on youtube I really want a cape so If you have any links or video links to help me get a cape I would really be delighted and happy I hope you read this propely and are gonna send a link below if you do send one if u want I don't mind but if you want you can join my pvp team even though the apps are closed and also if I do get a cape from the right link I will maybe do a giveaway to the winner who gives me the best cape link vid or little word thing I really hope you do and again if u give me the right link to me to get a cape I will also remember to make you vote I will go on avicus voting everyday and vote for you tell me that voting game you want me to vote you and I hope I get a cape thank you so much for reading CYA!

replies.body:
What? since when do you have to be good at pvp?
No one has to be good at pvp, and Optifine Capes certainly don't make anyone any better at pvp than what they are...
if you make fun of someone for their pvp, that's just wrong...

replies.body:
Having an optifine cape doesn't automatically put you in the expectation to be good at pvp, after all, I have an optifine cape, and I'm bad at pvp :P

It doesn't matter how many people have OF capes, the generalization is that it's more of a 50 - 50 thing, more people that are more popular just happen to have them.

replies.body:
You can get an OptiFine cape, but they cost money and can only be seen by people running OptiFine.

Or you can go to Minecon, which is hard to do, and costs a ton of money depending on where it is and where you live.
